ruleEntry.formula:
IF( ISPICKVAL(Origin, "Web") ,
AND(NOT(ISBLANK(Web_Country__c)),CONTAINS("Afghanistan,Antarctica,Timor-Leste,Falkland Islands,Georgia,Iran,Kiribati,Marshall Islands,Micronesia,Nauru,Niue,Korea (the Democratic People's Republic of),Palau,Palestine, State of,Samoa,Solomon Islands,Taiwan,Tonga,Tuvalu,Vanuatu", Web_Country__c)),
AND(NOT(ISBLANK(Contact.MailingCountry)),CONTAINS("Afghanistan,Antarctica,Timor-Leste,Falkland Islands,Georgia,Iran,Kiribati,Marshall Islands,Micronesia,Nauru,Niue,Korea (the Democratic People's Republic of),Palau,Palestine, State of,Samoa,Solomon Islands,Taiwan,Tonga,Tuvalu,Vanuatu", Contact.MailingCountry )))

IF( ISPICKVAL(Origin, "Web") ,
AND(NOT(ISBLANK(Web_Country__c)),CONTAINS("Japan",Web_Country__c)),
AND(NOT(ISBLANK(Contact.MailingCountry)),CONTAINS("Japan", Contact.MailingCountry)))

IF( ISPICKVAL(Origin, "Web") ,
AND(NOT(ISBLANK(Web_Country__c)),CONTAINS("Aruba,Virgin Islands (U.S.),Bahamas,Barbados,Belize,Costa Rica,Dominica,Dominican Republic,El Salvador,Grenada,Guadeloupe,Guam,Guatemala,Haiti,Honduras,Jamaica,United States Minor Outlying Islands,Nicaragua,Northern Mariana Islands,Panama,Puerto Rico,Saint Lucia,Saint Vincent and the Grenadines,Saint Kitts and Nevis,American Samoa,Trinidad and Tobago,United States of America", Web_Country__c)),
AND(NOT(ISBLANK(Contact.MailingCountry)),CONTAINS("Aruba,Virgin Islands (U.S.),Bahamas,Barbados,Belize,Costa Rica,Dominica,Dominican Republic,El Salvador,Grenada,Guadeloupe,Guam,Guatemala,Haiti,Honduras,Jamaica,United States Minor Outlying Islands,Nicaragua,Northern Mariana Islands,Panama,Puerto Rico,Saint Lucia,Saint Vincent and the Grenadines,Saint Kitts and Nevis,American Samoa,Trinidad and Tobago,United States of America", Contact.MailingCountry)))

AND(NOT(ISBLANK(Web_Country__c)),CONTAINS("Canada",Web_Country__c)),
AND(NOT(ISBLANK(Contact.MailingCountry)),CONTAINS("Canada", Contact.MailingCountry )))

AND(NOT(ISBLANK(Web_Country__c)),CONTAINS("Mexico", Web_Country__c)),
